programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Bobbi's Bongos - Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Tiny Chef S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Banana - Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Polar Derby - Blaze and his friends head to VelocityVille and transform into racecars for the Polar Derby, a wintry race through the snow! But when racecar Crusher knocks them off-course, the pals must keep cool to stay on track.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Driving Force - When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they’ll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Charged Up Pups vs the Super Sonic Sound System - Mighty Pups, Chase and Rocky, get 'Charged Up' to take on a maniacal musical menace: DJ Harold Humdinger's Super Sonic Sound System!

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Charged Up Pups vs A Copy Cat Marshall - It's up to 'Charged Up' Mighty Marshall to clear his name when Copy Cat steals Marshall's vehicle and impersonates him, melting everything in his path with his heat paw power!

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Charged Up Pups vs the Teenybots - Charged Up' Rubble goes wrecking-balling for Teenybots, when Copy Cat and Harold team up and lead a small army of minirobot minions in an invasion of Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Charged Up Pups vs A Super Meow Meow - Charged Up' Skye and Zuma square off against a cycloniccatastrophe-causing robo-kitty, when Harold reactivates 'Meow Meow,' super-powering-it-up with a meteor shard!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma - When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Bubble Medics to the Rescue! - In Ancient Greece, Paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance! But on the way, they're pursued by a giant Cyclops! Will they help Nonny before the Cyclops catches up to them?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Kingdom of Clean! - Dirty Deema has stolen Molly and Gil's soap, and made The Kingdom of Clean very dirty! Molly and Gil have to get their soap back, and clean up the kingdom!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: From One Pit to Another - The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Bobbi's Bongos - Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Builds Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek - Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Bubble Medics to the Rescue! - In Ancient Greece, Paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance! But on the way, they're pursued by a giant Cyclops! Will they help Nonny before the Cyclops catches up to them?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket - When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep111
programme.desc: Mixed Up - Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po have their favourite things. The bag, the hat, the scooter and the ball all magically swap places and become mixed up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep16
programme.desc: Shark - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shark' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of sharks! There's a pointy nosed shark and a big fin shark, a speedy shark and a grey and white shark.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep71
programme.desc: Climbing The Walls and Ceilings - Can Team Tinpo help a rock climber reach new heights?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep17
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit a Maze - JoJo and Gran Gran visit a maze and see their friends Alfie and Ellie. They race towards the centre of the maze, but JoJo can't seem to figure out how to get there.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Pea Soup - Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: Topsy Turvy Time - Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Teasing - Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Rescue Badge - Enid the cat gets stuck when she chases a mouse up a tree, so Duggee and the squirrels rescue her.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Summer Holiday Badge - The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky - suitcase and all!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Hair Badge - Duggee is having a bad hair day, so the squirrels and Norrie decide to help him.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Andy and The Humpback Whale - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to the Pacific Ocean, off the coast of Mexico. His mission, to record a male humpback whale.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Food Machines - Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing food machines!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep25
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Treasure Trove - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Cake Badge - The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep10
programme.desc: Percy and the Calliope - Percy tries to fix an old calliope so that it isn't scrapped.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep26
programme.desc: Scooter Stand Still - Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep25
programme.desc: Lost Librarian - The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Windmill Girl - When the wind blows fast Nora has to go fast, but when the wind blows slow, Nora has great fun speeding up and slowing down with the wind.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: This Is Actually My Party - More fun and games with the lovable siblings. Lola is determined to make Charlie's birthday party the best birthday party ever.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Coming Back - Gwen and Bob think that an enormous dino is coming back to squash them, so they hide.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Fly - Gwen tells a baby bird she will teach it how to fly. The only problem is that she doesn't know how to herself!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.desc: Little Sandy's Big Bug Hunt - The Numtums are on a quest to find the Lesser Spotted Ladybird and to find Larry who has the Super Numtum comic.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep105
programme.desc: The Splinter / Slide Whistle Stooges - While working at the Krusty Krab, SpongeBob accidentally gets a splinter. // SpongeBob and Patrick are having fun with their new slide whistles, and, of course, it's driving Squidward crazy.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Picture Day / Pat No Pay / Blackjack - It's Picture Day for the Boating School Year Book. // When Patrick eats his weight in Krabby Patties without paying, Mr. Krabs puts him to work in the restaurant. // SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Blackened Sponge / Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - SpongeBob accidentally punches himself in the face leaving behind a hideous black eye, but is too embarrassed to tell anyone the truth. // Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Master and the Panda - When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually evil Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to powerful Peng that he is the one who skadooshed his uncle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Present Tense - As the annual Winter Festival approaches, Po doesn't have enough money to buy his dad the present he deserves, so he takes a job as a bounty hunter to capture a dangerous escaped convict for the reward. But Po's plan doesn't go as smooth as he hoped.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep202

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Alienated - Lemmy the robot returns from Mars. Unknowingly a space squid has stowed away in his chest cavity.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Right Hand Man / Brain Drain - The lemur habitat acquires a new resident. King Julien loves to order around his new attentive servant, but Mort is suspicious. // Kowalski’s attempt to super charge his brain backfires. Instead of becoming a mega genius he’s now dumber than mud.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Cute-astrophe / King Julien for a Day - Private hones in on his cuteness factor and BOOSH! Any witness or potential threat is instantly disabled - adorability has been weaponized. // In the haste of a zoo animal meeting, King Julien and Skipper are agreed to switch places for a single day.
